content.question: An object travels along a straight line across a horizontal surface, and its motion is described by the velocity versus time graph shown in the figure. Which of the following methods will determine the total displacement of the object between <math alttext="0 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="5 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>? Select two answers.

choices.label: Finding the slope of the line between <math alttext="0 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="5 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

Dividing the change in velocity between <math alttext="0 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="5 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> by the change in time

Finding the area bound by the horizontal axis and the curve from <math alttext="0 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="5 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

Using <math alttext="Average speed equals, the fraction total distance over total" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>v</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>e</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mtext> </mtext><mi>S</mi><mi>p</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>t</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>s</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>tan</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>t</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> and multiplying the average speed of <math alttext="5 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> </mtext><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> by a total time of <math alttext="5 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: Finding the area bound by the horizontal axis and the curve from <math alttext="0 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="5 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
